long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TMBOT only supports T5 Kingdoms! not T4.6 Legends!

What are the advantages of the TMBOT?

TMBOT automatically performs the following functions with flexible settings:

Auto Adventure: Automatically sends your hero on the type of adventure you want.

Automatic Festival: Organizes any type of festival you want from the villages you choose.

Automatic Loot: Automatically runs the loot lists from the villages you want at the times you specify.

Construction Queue: You can build any buildings you want from the villages you choose and put them in the queue.

Production Area Developer: You can develop the production areas you want from any village you want.

Robber Camp Looter: Give the bandit camp coordinates on the map and let the software do the rest.

Stolen Goods Seller: Sells stolen goods from the village of your choice at intervals you specify.

Timed Attack: It works to launch an attack within seconds at any time and at any coordinate you want.

Trade Route: You can establish a raw material route to the village you want at regular intervals.

Training Soldiers: You can train soldiers from any village you want, at any time you want.

Soldier Booster: Improves the levels of the soldiers you want through the foundry.
